DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect caffeine self-administration alcohol . The study also examine combine effect alcohol caffeine behavioral performance , participant rating behavioral performance , self-reported subjective effect .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study examine effect caffeine alcohol self-administration . Volunteers participate 7 experimental session give opportunity self-administer alcohol + caffeine alcohol + caffeine-placebo beverage . The first 6 session involve exposure two beverage condition mixed order three time ( e.g. , A , B , B , A , A , B ) . The seventh session choice session participant make single choice begin session beverage consume day . In addition primary outcome quantity alcohol self-administered beverage choice , three additional outcome measure include : 1 ) . indirect measure reinforce effect ( e.g . subjective rating like , well-being , take ) ; 2 ) . alcohol-sensitive behavioral measure ; 3 ) . participant rating degree behavioral impairment .
DOC.criteria: Very light moderate consumer caffeine ( either daily nondaily ) . Social drinker alcohol . Has experience lifetime heavy alcohol consumption . Read , write , speak English fluently . Serious unstable illness include current hepatic , renal , gastroenterologic , respiratory , cardiovascular ( include ischemic heart disease , uncontrolled hypertension , congestive heart failure ) , endocrinologic , neurologic ( include stroke , transient ischemic attack , subarachnoidal bleeding , brain tumor , encephalopathy , meningitis ) , hematologic disease . Parkinson 's disease , seizure disorder , history significant head trauma . Current psychiatric illness Pregnant nursing woman woman use effective mean birth control .
